name: +2 Mace
oracle_text:
Equipped creature gets +2/+2.
Equip {3} ({3}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
flavor_text: The weight of this magic weapon falls heavy on the wicked.

name: Air-Cult Elemental
oracle_text:
Flying
Whirlwind — When Air-Cult Elemental enters the battlefield, return up to one other target creature to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: Elemental Evil distorts the natural elements, limiting them to aspects of destruction.

name: Arborea Pegasus
oracle_text:
Flying
When Arborea Pegasus enters the battlefield, target creature gets +1/+1 and gains flying until end of turn.
flavor_text: The noble steeds of the elven gods can sometimes be persuaded to allow mere mortals on their backs.

name: Arcane Investigator
oracle_text:
Search the Room — {5}{U}: Roll a d20.
1—9 | Draw a card.
10—20 | Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

name: Armory Veteran
oracle_text: As long as Armory Veteran is equipped, it has menace. (It can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
flavor_text: "This one is for goblins, this one is for owlbears, this one is for toast, this one is for . . ."

name: Baleful Beholder
oracle_text:
When Baleful Beholder enters the battlefield, choose one —
• Antimagic Cone — Each opponent sacrifices an enchantment.
• Fear Ray — Creatures you control gain menace until end of turn. (A creature with menace can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

name: Bar the Gate
oracle_text: Counter target creature or planeswalker spell. Venture into the dungeon. (Enter the first room or advance to the next room.)
flavor_text: "This path is closed to you!"

name: Boots of Speed
oracle_text:
Equipped creature gets +1/+0 and has haste.
Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
flavor_text: Click your heels and become the wind.

name: Brazen Dwarf
oracle_text: Whenever you roll one or more dice, Brazen Dwarf deals 1 damage to each opponent.
flavor_text: "My grandmother saved the life of a brass dragon, and in return she was given a glimpse of the fire in its heart—a glimpse she passed down to me."

name: Bulette
oracle_text: At the beginning of your end step, if a creature died this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Bulette.
flavor_text: Capable of moving swiftly through even tightly-packed earth and leaping surprising distances above ground, bulettes are difficult to escape once they've caught scent of prey.

name: Bull's Strength
oracle_text: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains trample until end of turn. Untap it.
flavor_text: As the iron bars of the portcullis parted like reeds, the defenders of the keep suddenly felt much less secure.

name: Celestial Unicorn
oracle_text: Whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on Celestial Unicorn.
flavor_text: When all hope fails, its light remains.

name: Charmed Sleep
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
When Charmed Sleep enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

name: Circle of the Moon Druid
oracle_text: Bear Form — As long as it's your turn, Circle of the Moon Druid is a Bear with base power and toughness 4/2. (It loses all other creature types.)
flavor_text: Druids of the Circle of the Moon are fierce guardians of nature who haunt the deepest parts of the wilderness.

name: Clattering Skeletons
oracle_text: When Clattering Skeletons dies, venture into the dungeon. (Enter the first room or advance to the next room.)
flavor_text: Those who die in the dungeon become its guardians.

name: Clever Conjurer
oracle_text: Mage Hand — {T}: Untap target permanent not named Clever Conjurer. Activate only as a sorcery.
flavor_text: "I'm always happy to lend a hand!"

name: Compelled Duel
oracle_text: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn and must be blocked this turn if able.
flavor_text: "You might be four times my size, but I will not be ignored!"

name: Contact Other Plane
oracle_text:
Roll a d20.
1—9 | Draw two cards.
10—19 | Scry 2, then draw two cards.
20 | Scry 3, then draw three cards.

name: Dawnbringer Cleric
oracle_text:
When Dawnbringer Cleric enters the battlefield, choose one —
• Cure Wounds — You gain 2 life.
• Dispel Magic — Destroy target enchantment.
• Gentle Repose — Exile target card from a graveyard.

name: Deadly Dispute
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact or creature.
Draw two cards and create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
flavor_text: "That's a pretty ring! Trade you my knife for it."

name: Delver's Torch
oracle_text:
Equipped creature gets +1/+1.
Whenever equipped creature attacks, venture into the dungeon. (Enter the first room or advance to the next room.)
Equip {3} ({3}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
flavor_text: "Not all of us have darkvision, okay?"

name: Devoted Paladin
oracle_text: Beacon of Hope — When Devoted Paladin enters the battlefield, creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain vigilance until end of turn.
flavor_text: "I swore a sacred oath to protect the weak and punish those who threaten them. As long as I draw breath, I will protect you."

name: Devour Intellect
oracle_text: Target opponent discards a card. If mana from a Treasure was spent to cast this spell, instead that player reveals their hand, you choose a nonland card from it, then that player discards that card.
flavor_text:
"I'll know what you know soon enough."
—Nihiloor, Xanathar Guild spymaster

name: Dire Wolf Prowler
oracle_text: {1}{G}: Dire Wolf Prowler gets +2/+2 and gains haste until end of turn. Activate only once each turn.
flavor_text: Large as horses, dire wolves must hunt often to satisfy thier ravenous hunger. A mere human does little more than blunt their appetite.

name: Djinni Windseer
oracle_text:
Flying
When Djinni Windseer enters the battlefield, roll a d20.
1—9 | Scry 1.
10—19 | Scry 2.
20 | Scry 3.

name: Dragon's Fire
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may reveal a Dragon card from your hand or choose a Dragon you control.
Dragon's Fire deals 3 damage to target creature or planeswalker. If you revealed a Dragon card or chose a Dragon as you cast this spell, Dragon's Fire deals damage equal to the power of that card or creature instead.

name: Dueling Rapier
oracle_text:
Flash
When Dueling Rapier enters the battlefield, attach it to target creature you control.
Equipped creature gets +2/+0.
Equip {4} ({4}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

name: Dwarfhold Champion
oracle_text: As long as Dwarfhold Champion is equipped, it gets +0/+2.
flavor_text: Courage is neither a shield nor an axe, but the will to wield both in defense of the innocent.

name: Earth-Cult Elemental
oracle_text:
Siege Monster — When Earth-Cult Elemental enters the battlefield, roll a d20.
1—9 | Each player sacrifices a permanent.
10—19 | Each opponent sacrifices a permanent.
20 | Each opponent sacrifices two permanents.

name: Elturgard Ranger
oracle_text:
Reach
When Elturgard Ranger enters the battlefield, create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token.
flavor_text: Since the fall of Elturel, they've walked the Sword Coast from Tethyr to Icewind Dale, eyes always on their prey.

name: Evolving Wilds
oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice Evolving Wilds: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor_text: Parts of Faerûn still churn with the magic of arrogant Netherese archmages long dead.

name: Eyes of the Beholder
oracle_text: Target creature gets -11/-11 until end of turn.
flavor_text: In the end, there was nothing beautiful to be seen.

name: Farideh's Fireball
oracle_text:
Farideh's Fireball deals 5 damage to target creature or planeswalker. Roll a d20.
1—9 | Farideh's Fireball deals 2 damage to each player.
10—20 | Farideh's Fireball deals 2 damage to each opponent.

name: Fates' Reversal
oracle_text: Return up to one target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. Venture into the dungeon. (Enter the first room or advance to the next room.)
flavor_text: A doom denied—or, perhaps, delayed.

name: Feign Death
oracle_text: Until end of turn, target creature gains "When this creature dies, return it to the battlefield tapped under its owner's control with a +1/+1 counter on it."
flavor_text: A drastic measure for dangerous times.

name: Find the Path
oracle_text:
Enchant land
When Find the Path enters the battlefield, venture into the dungeon. (Enter the first room or advance to the next room.)
Enchanted land has "{T}: Add {G}{G}."

name: Forest
flavor_text: As the sun reaches its zenith on the day of the solstice, a castle shimmers into view on the hilltop, just as the ancient text predicted.

name: Gloom Stalker
oracle_text: As long as you've completed a dungeon, Gloom Stalker has double strike.
flavor_text: "I'll make sure you never mistake a roper for a stalagmite again."

name: Gnoll Hunter
oracle_text: Pack tactics — Whenever Gnoll Hunter attacks, if you attacked with creatures with total power 6 or greater this combat, put a +1/+1 counter on Gnoll Hunter.
flavor_text: Yipping and cackling, the hunters tore through the village, leaving nothing but snapped bones and burning homes in their wake.

name: Goblin Javelineer
oracle_text:
Haste
Whenever Goblin Javelineer becomes blocked, it deals 1 damage to target creature blocking it.
flavor_text: Hate gets you only so far. A pointy stick can close the rest of the distance.

name: Greataxe
oracle_text:
Equipped creature gets +4/+0.
Equip {5} ({5}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
flavor_text: "If you're so mighty, scaled one, then why are you dead?"

name: Grim Bounty
oracle_text: Destroy target creature or planeswalker. Create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
flavor_text: Freed from the need to pay tribute to the dragon, the villages gladly paid the dragon-slayers instead.

name: Half-Elf Monk
oracle_text:
Vigilance
Stunning Strike — {1}{W}, {T}: Tap target creature.
flavor_text: This fight was over the moment you picked up that clumsy cleaver of a sword.

name: Herald of Hadar
oracle_text:
Circle of Death — {5}{B}: Roll a d20.
1—9 | Each opponent loses 2 life.
10—19 | Each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
20 | Each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life. Create two Treasure tokens. (They're artifacts with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

name: Hill Giant Herdgorger
oracle_text: When Hill Giant Herdgorger enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.
flavor_text: A shepherd's crook is useful for cleaning bits of wool out of the teeth.

name: Hired Hexblade
oracle_text: When Hired Hexblade enters the battlefield, if mana from a Treasure was spent to cast it, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.
flavor_text: "I'll take care of it. You just be sure to hold up your end of the deal."

name: Hoarding Ogre
oracle_text:
Whenever Hoarding Ogre attacks, roll a d20.
1—9 | Create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
10—19 | Create two Treasure tokens.
20 | Create three Treasure tokens.

name: Hoard Robber
oracle_text: Whenever Hoard Robber deals combat damage to a player, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
flavor_text: "And to think, a year ago I was picking pockets in Waterdeep."

name: Hobgoblin Captain
oracle_text: Pack tactics — Whenever Hobgoblin Captain attacks, if you attacked with creatures with total power 6 or greater this combat, Hobgoblin Captain gains first strike until end of turn.
flavor_text: Hobgoblins do not fear death, for those who fall in battle have gained glory eternal.

name: Improvised Weaponry
oracle_text: Improvised Weaponry deals 2 damage to any target. Create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
flavor_text: Anything can be a weapon if you swing it hard enough.

name: Inspiring Bard
oracle_text:
When Inspiring Bard enters the battlefield, choose one —
• Bardic Inspiration — Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
• Song of Rest — You gain 3 life.
flavor_text: "Wake up, my friends! There are deeds to be done and treasures to be won!"

name: Island
flavor_text: In crystal-studded waters far below the surface, you've discovered an incubating egg of mysterious origin.

name: Jaded Sell-Sword
oracle_text: When Jaded Sell-Sword enters the battlefield, if mana from a Treasure was spent to cast it, it gains first strike and haste until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Today? That'll cost you extra."

name: Kick in the Door
oracle_text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. That creature gains haste until end of turn and can't be blocked by Walls this turn. Venture into the dungeon. (Enter the first room or advance to the next room.)
flavor_text:
"We tried your way. Now we do it my way!"
—Jym, barbarian of Baldur's Gate

name: Leather Armor
oracle_text:
Equipped creature gets +0/+1 and has ward {1}. (Whenever equipped creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {1}.)
Equip {0}. Activate only once each turn.
flavor_text: Lightweight, flexible, and protective.

name: Manticore
oracle_text:
Flash
Flying
Tail Spikes — When Manticore enters the battlefield, destroy target creature an opponent controls that was dealt damage this turn.

name: Mimic
oracle_text:
{T}, Sacrifice Mimic: Add one mana of any color.
{2}: Mimic becomes a Shapeshifter artifact creature with base power and toughness 3/3 until end of turn.

name: Minimus Containment
oracle_text:
Enchant nonland permanent
Enchanted permanent is a Treasure artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color," and it loses all other abilities. (If it was a creature, it's no longer a creature.)

name: Mordenkainen's Polymorph
oracle_text: Until end of turn, target creature becomes a Dragon with base power and toughness 4/4 and gains flying. (It loses all other creature types.)
flavor_text: "Your purpose may change along with your shape, but you will serve regardless."

name: Mountain
flavor_text: You meant to simply rest in Hundelstone, but the miners have told you stories of whispers in the dark below.

name: Neverwinter Dryad
oracle_text: {2}, Sacrifice Neverwinter Dryad: Search your library for a basic Forest card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor_text: Its life force entwined with its tree, a dryad is an elusive and solitary being that wishes only to be left alone.

name: Owlbear
oracle_text:
Trample
Keen Senses — When Owlbear enters the battlefield, draw a card.
flavor_text: Many people believe a misguided wizard created the first owlbear, but others insist that these creatures have always dwelled in the Feywild.

name: Paladin's Shield
oracle_text:
Flash
When Paladin's Shield enters the battlefield, attach it to target creature you control.
Equipped creature gets +0/+2.
Equip {3} ({3}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

name: Pixie Guide
oracle_text:
Flying
Grant an Advantage — If you would roll one or more dice, instead roll that many dice plus one and ignore the lowest roll.
flavor_text: Pixies are well known as pranksters, but some delight in more helpful magic.

name: Plains
flavor_text: You've traced the tensions in Ten-Towns to the dwindling reindeer populations ... but what has been hunting them?

name: Planar Ally
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever Planar Ally attacks, venture into the dungeon. (Enter the first room or advance to the next room.)
flavor_text: Her light touches every corner and her wings brush either wall, leaving no place for evil to lurk.

name: Plummet
oracle_text: Destroy target creature with flying.
flavor_text: The dragon's noxious breath withered the forest. The whistle of a hundred arrows filled the air. The ground roiled as if shaken by an earthquake. The tyrant fell from the sky.

name: Plundering Barbarian
oracle_text:
When Plundering Barbarian enters the battlefield, choose one —
• Smash the Chest — Destroy target artifact.
• Pry It Open — Create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

name: Potion of Healing
oracle_text:
When Potion of Healing enters the battlefield, draw a card.
{W}, {T}, Sacrifice Potion of Healing: You gain 3 life.
flavor_text: Magic can knit the body back together, but the courage to fight on comes only from within.

name: Precipitous Drop
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
When Precipitous Drop enters the battlefield, venture into the dungeon. (Enter the first room or advance to the next room.)
Enchanted creature gets -2/-2. It gets -5/-5 instead as long as you've completed a dungeon.

name: Price of Loyalty
oracle_text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. If mana from a Treasure was spent to cast this spell, that creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Most folks got mayhem in their hearts. Just gotta know their price."

name: Priest of Ancient Lore
oracle_text: When Priest of Ancient Lore enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life and draw a card.
flavor_text: "We are a product of our ancestors, the apotheosis of countless noble generations. Speak their names with reverence, and they will guide your path."

name: Ranger's Hawk
oracle_text:
Flying
{3}, {T}, Tap another untapped creature you control: Venture into the dungeon. Activate only as a sorcery. (Enter the first room or advance to the next room.)
flavor_text: Swift eyes to scout the way ahead.

name: Ranger's Longbow
oracle_text:
Equipped creature gets +2/+1 and has reach.
Equip {3} ({3}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
flavor_text: With the right weapon, a fearsome beholder is nothing more than a big floating bullseye.

name: Rimeshield Frost Giant
oracle_text: Ward {3} (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {3}.)
flavor_text: Frost giants carry the trophies of their greatest victories into battle, fashioned into armor of strength and savage beauty.

name: Scaled Herbalist
oracle_text: {T}: You may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.
flavor_text: "I could help you, or I could eat you for lunch. I haven't decided yet."

name: Scion of Stygia
oracle_text:
Flash
Cone of Cold — When Scion of Stygia enters the battlefield, choose target creature an opponent controls, then roll a d20.
1—9 | Tap that creature.
10—20 | Tap that creature. It doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

name: Secret Door
oracle_text:
Defender
{4}{U}: Venture into the dungeon. Activate only as a sorcery. (Enter the first room or advance to the next room.)
flavor_text: The way opened before him, and the dust of centuries stirred in the air.

name: Sepulcher Ghoul
oracle_text: Sacrifice another creature: Sepulcher Ghoul gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate only once each turn.
flavor_text: Ghouls devour the dead and any living creatures unwary enough to fall into their grasp.

name: Shambling Ghast
oracle_text:
When Shambling Ghast dies, choose one —
• Brave the Stench — Target creature an opponent controls gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
• Search the Body — Create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

name: Shocking Grasp
oracle_text:
Target creature gets -2/-0 until end of turn.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: "Metal armor? A poor choice."

name: Shortcut Seeker
oracle_text: Whenever Shortcut Seeker deals combat damage to a player, venture into the dungeon. (Enter the first room or advance to the next room.)
flavor_text: "Ah, the old 'trap door under a rug' trick. This is almost too easy."

name: Silver Raven
oracle_text:
Flying
When Silver Raven enters the battlefield, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
flavor_text: Wings take flight on whispered wind.

name: Soulknife Spy
oracle_text: Whenever Soulknife Spy deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.
flavor_text: "My psychic blade cuts the mind and severs thoughts. Even if you survive, you'll never remember I was here."

name: Spare Dagger
oracle_text:
Equipped creature gets +1/+0 and has "Whenever this creature attacks, you may sacrifice Spare Dagger. When you do, this creature deals 1 damage to any target."
Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

name: Spiked Pit Trap
oracle_text:
Flash
{5}, {T}, Sacrifice Spiked Pit Trap: Choose target creature, then roll a d20.
1—9 | Spiked Pit Trap deals 5 damage to that creature.
10—20 | Spiked Pit Trap deals 5 damage to that creature. Create a Treasure token.

name: Spoils of the Hunt
oracle_text: Target creature you control gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each mana from a Treasure that was spent to cast this spell. Then that creature deals damage equal to its power to target creature an opponent controls.
flavor_text: "Every coin helps rebuild the town they destroyed."

name: Steadfast Paladin
oracle_text: Lifelink
flavor_text: "When I made my oath to Moradin, I left selfishness and cowardice behind. Every battle, I make that commitment anew."

name: Swamp
flavor_text: As a plague ravages the world above, you've made your way into the Underdark in search of a fungal panacea.

name: Swarming Goblins
oracle_text:
When Swarming Goblins enters the battlefield, roll a d20.
1—9 | Create a 1/1 red Goblin creature token.
10—19 | Create two of those tokens.
20 | Create three of those tokens.

name: Sylvan Shepherd
oracle_text:
Vigilance
Whenever Sylvan Shepherd attacks, roll a d20.
1—9 | You gain 1 life.
10—19 | You gain 2 life.
20 | You gain 5 life.

name: Thieves' Tools
oracle_text:
When Thieves' Tools enters the battlefield, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
Equipped creature can't be blocked as long as its power is 3 or less.
Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

name: Underdark Basilisk
oracle_text: Deathtouch
flavor_text:
"See how the statues all have chunks bitten out of them? We're dealing with a basilisk, or I'm a froghemoth."
—Larissa Kyriln, learned warlock

name: Unexpected Windfall
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card.
Draw two cards and create two Treasure tokens. (They're artifacts with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
flavor_text: Fortune favors the fortunate.

name: Valor Singer
oracle_text: Combat Inspiration — At the beginning of combat on your turn, target creature you control gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "There is only one way forward: into legend."

name: Vampire Spawn
oracle_text: When Vampire Spawn enters the battlefield, each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
flavor_text: Unsuccessful vampire hunters often wind up as ravenous spawn.

name: Veteran Dungeoneer
oracle_text: When Veteran Dungeoneer enters the battlefield, venture into the dungeon. (Enter the first room or advance to the next room.)
flavor_text: Her tales of glory light a fire in the souls of the next generation of adventurers.

name: You Come to a River
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Fight the Current — Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.
• Find a Crossing — Target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn and can't be blocked this turn.

name: You Come to the Gnoll Camp
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Intimidate Them — Up to two target creatures can't block this turn.
• Fend Them Off — Target creature gets +3/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Easy now, everyone. I'll take care of this."
—Nadaar

name: You Find a Cursed Idol
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Smash It — Destroy target artifact.
• Lift the Curse — Destroy target enchantment.
• Steal Its Eyes — Create a Treasure token and venture into the dungeon. (Enter the first room or advance to the next room.)

name: You Find the Villains' Lair
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Foil Their Scheme — Counter target spell.
• Learn Their Secrets — Draw two cards, then discard two cards.
flavor_text: "Give me just a moment! I almost have it."

name: You Hear Something on Watch
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Rouse the Party — Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
• Set Off Traps — This spell deals 5 damage to target attacking creature.

name: You're Ambushed on the Road
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Make a Retreat — Return target creature you control to its owner's hand.
• Stand and Fight — Target creature gets +1/+3 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Hand over your loot and no one gets hurt!"

name: You See a Guard Approach
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Distract the Guard — Tap target creature.
• Hide — Target creature you control gains hexproof until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
flavor_text: "Looks like we've got company."

name: Yuan-Ti Fang-Blade
oracle_text:
Deathtouch
Whenever Yuan-Ti Fang-Blade deals combat damage to a player, venture into the dungeon. (Enter the first room or advance to the next room.)
flavor_text: "The air is sweet with the taste of your fear."

name: Zombie Ogre
oracle_text: At the beginning of your end step, if a creature died this turn, venture into the dungeon. (Enter the first room or advance to the next room.)
flavor_text:
"On the plus side, Throg no longer thinks he's clever."
—Xanathar
